definitions.text: regard something as probable or likely
examples: The meteorologists are expecting rain for tomorrow
We require our secretary to be on time
Aren't we asking too much of these children?
I expect my students to arrive in time for their lessons

definitions.text: look forward to the probable occurrence of
examples: We were expecting a visit from our relatives
She is looking to a promotion
he is waiting to be drafted
I'm expecting a full explanation as to why these files were destroyed

definitions.text: look forward to the birth of a child

examples: The are expecting another child in January
synonyms: have a bun in the oven
